Class InfraredDistanceSensor

java.lang.Object
  MechSim.Sensors.Sensor
      MechSim.Sensors.AnalogSensor
          MechSim.Sensors.InfraredDistanceSensor

public class InfraredDistanceSensor
extends AnalogSensor

A Sensor finds the distance to the nearest infrared object directly in front of it.

Author:
Gurwinder Gulati

Field Detail

INFRARED_COLOR

public static final Color INFRARED_COLOR
Color that all infrared objects must be. In addition, infrared objects must have InteractionType.Ghost

Constructor Detail

InfraredDistanceSensor

public InfraredDistanceSensor(Robot robot,
                              double pollingInterval,
                              double rotation)
Creates a Sensor finds the distance to the nearest infrared object directly in front of it.

Parameters:
robot - Robot the Sensor is attached to
pollingInterval - Time, in milliseconds, between updating the Sensor's data
rotation - Orientation of the Sensor relative to the Robot
Method Detail

Poll

Description copied from class: Sensor
OVERRIDE THIS. Polls and updates data internally.
